BASIC ultrasound should ideally be scanned by a mor e
ex
perienced person-e.g., accredited sonographer (at any level of care) or referred to a specialist obstetrician
supported service for evaluation (level two scan):
o multiple pregnancies- as soon as possible; to determine chorionicity
o discordant measurements- if there is (around 20 weeks) a discrepancy of 10 days or more between any
of the following: BPD, FL, AC; refer within one week
o placental location- if placenta < 2cm from the intern
